FuncDef: The ntp ipv6 receive disable command disables an interface from receiving NTP packets. The undo ntp ipv6 receive disable command enables an interface to receive NTP packets. By default, an interface is enabled to receive NTP packets.
ParentView: 100GE interface view,10GE interface view,25GE interface view,Eth-Trunk interface view,Tunnel interface view,VLANIF interface view
